long_description: This collapsible two-liter reservoir with drinking tube assembly turns any pack into a hydration pack for water on demand when you're on the go. Lightweight, puncture-resistant, three-ply plastic laminate is lined with food-grade polyethylene that won't flavor your water with a plastic taste. Durable welded construction lets you boil, freeze, inflate and collapse the bag over and over again. Reservoir is lined with SlimeGuard(TM), an antimicrobial treatment that keeps water fresh and taste free. Drinking tube assembly includes HyperFlow(TM) bite valve that has one of the highest flow rates on the market; lapel clip included. Modular design lets you create your own system; can be combined with other Platypus products to create other systems for maximize versatility. Integrated hang loop allows easy attachment inside of packs.
